original_text: all the vessels of gold and of silver were 5,400. All these did Sheshbazzar bring up, when the exiles were brought up from Babylonia to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 금, 은 그릇이 모두 오천사백 개라 사로잡힌 자를 바벨론에서 예루살렘으로 데리고 갈 때에 세스바살이 그 그릇들을 다 가지고 갔더라

sentences.original_text: all the vessels of gold and of silver were 5,400.
All these did Sheshbazzar bring up,
when the exiles were brought up
